Text.Page:
Yes, that carriage should have passed by here, but I certainly haven't seen it.

If you head north toward Allemantheia, you might be able to find out what happened to it.

Be careful, thoughâ€”there's a reason it didn't come by. Just watch your step out there.

(The people are dead and the food supplies are gone.)

(There is a weapon on the ground. You should probably take it back to Tarnan.)

Attacked? Yeah, I worried you'd say that.

Found a weapon, though? Let me see that."Sure, have a look."

This is a Tenebrara weapon! Why would they attack us?

This doesn't make any sense!
